comment: Missouri is one of the three lowest vaccination rate states. Our governor sucks. When Federal gets in here, hopefully it'll get better.
amr:
# ::snt Missouri is one of the three lowest vaccination rate states. Our governor sucks. When Federal gets in here, hopefully it'll get better.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / include-91
            :ARG1 (s / state
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Missouri"))
            :ARG2 (s2 / state
                  :quant 3
                  :location-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 (r / rate
                              :mod (v / vaccinate-01))
                        :ARG2 (l / low-04
                              :ARG1 r)
                        :ARG3 (m2 / most))))
      :snt2 (s3 / suck-03
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG2 (g / governor))
                  :poss (w / we)))
      :snt3 (g2 / get-03
            :ARG1 (f / federal)
            :ARG2 (h3 / here)
            :ARG1-of (h4 / hope-01)
            :time g2
            :ARG1 f
            :ARG2 h3))

comment: Oh yikes. My mothers going to get her first dose today and I hope my father and I will be getting ours soon since we all registered on the same day, but our closest location is pretty close.
